snippet: Each was sentenced to 15 years in the death of an immigrant man working as a taxi driver who sustained blunt force injuries in 2013 after being dragged behind a police van and beaten.
abstract: Eight former police officers in South Africa are sentenced to 15 years in prison for 2013 murder of Mozambican cab driver, which was filmed and widely shared online.
lead_paragraph: Each was sentenced to 15 years in the death of an immigrant man working as a taxi driver who sustained blunt force injuries in 2013 after being dragged behind a police van and beaten.

headline.main: South Africa Court Sentences 8 Ex-Policemen in Immigrant’s Murder
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; South Africa: Police Officers Sentenced in the Murder of an Immigrant Cabby
